title: Modern Garamond?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414104919im_/http:/typophile.com/files/about_3822.jpg)

Judging by the spike on the /b/ and how parallel the connector bits (not the proper phrase) are to the stems I was thinking that this might a modern take on Garamond ... but I can't seem to find it anywheres.

Thanks in advance!
author: 5star

comments.content:
I think this is the [Google font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414104919/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.google.com/fonts) Playfair Display Bold Italic (thanks to Fivos's "Find My Font" tool). (TTF version available [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414104919/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/playfair-display) at FontSquirrel.)

- Mike Yanega
